2272    }
2273
2274    /**
2275     * Gets a set of plots connected (and including) this plot.
2276     * The returned set is immutable.
2277     *
2278     * @return a Set of Plots connected to this Plot
2279     */
2280    public Set<Plot> getConnectedPlots() {
2281        if (this.settings == null) {
2282            return Collections.singleton(this);
2283        }
2284        if (!this.isMerged()) {
2285            return Collections.singleton(this);
2286        }
2287        Plot basePlot = getBasePlot(false);
2288        if (this.connectedCache == null && this != basePlot) {
2289            // share cache between connected plots
2290            Set<Plot> connectedPlots = basePlot.getConnectedPlots();
2291            this.connectedCache = connectedPlots;
2292            return connectedPlots;
2293        }
2294        if (this.connectedCache != null && this.connectedCache.contains(this)) {
2295            return this.connectedCache;
2296        }
2297
2298        Set<Plot> tmpSet = new HashSet<>();
2299        tmpSet.add(this);
2300        HashSet<Plot> queueCache = new HashSet<>();
2301        ArrayDeque<Plot> frontier = new ArrayDeque<>();
2302        computeDirectMerged(queueCache, frontier, Direction.NORTH);
2303        computeDirectMerged(queueCache, frontier, Direction.EAST);
2304        computeDirectMerged(queueCache, frontier, Direction.SOUTH);
2305        computeDirectMerged(queueCache, frontier, Direction.WEST);
2306        Plot current;
2307        while ((current = frontier.poll()) != null) {
2308            if (!current.hasOwner() || current.settings == null) {
2309                continue;
2310            }
2311            tmpSet.add(current);
2312            queueCache.remove(current);
2313            addIfIncluded(current, Direction.NORTH, queueCache, tmpSet, frontier);
2314            addIfIncluded(current, Direction.EAST, queueCache, tmpSet, frontier);
2315            addIfIncluded(current, Direction.SOUTH, queueCache, tmpSet, frontier);
2316            addIfIncluded(current, Direction.WEST, queueCache, tmpSet, frontier);
2317        }
2318        tmpSet = Set.copyOf(tmpSet);
2319        this.connectedCache = tmpSet;
2320        return tmpSet;
2321    }
2322
2323    private void computeDirectMerged(Set<Plot> queueCache, Deque<Plot> frontier, Direction direction) {
2324        if (this.isMerged(direction)) {
2325            Plot tmp = this.area.getPlotAbs(this.id.getRelative(direction));
2326            assert tmp != null;
2327            if (!tmp.isMerged(direction.opposite())) {
2328                // invalid merge
2329                if (tmp.isOwnerAbs(this.getOwnerAbs())) {
2330                    tmp.getSettings().setMerged(direction.opposite(), true);
2331                    DBFunc.setMerged(tmp, tmp.getSettings().getMerged());
2332                } else {
2333                    this.getSettings().setMerged(direction, false);
2334                    DBFunc.setMerged(this, this.getSettings().getMerged());
2335                }
2336            }
2337            queueCache.add(tmp);
2338            frontier.add(tmp);
2339        }
2340    }
2341
2342    private void addIfIncluded(
2343            Plot current, Direction
2344            direction, Set<Plot> queueCache, Set<Plot> tmpSet, Deque<Plot> frontier
2345    ) {
2346        if (!current.isMerged(direction)) {
2347            return;
2348        }
2349        Plot tmp = current.area.getPlotAbs(current.id.getRelative(direction));
2350        if (tmp != null && !queueCache.contains(tmp) && !tmpSet.contains(tmp)) {
2351            queueCache.add(tmp);
2352            frontier.add(tmp);
2353        }
2354    }
2355
2356    /**
2357     * This will combine each plot into effective rectangular regions<br>
2358     * - This result is cached globally<br>
2359     * - Useful for handling non rectangular shapes
2360     *
2361     * @return all regions within the plot
2362     */
2363    public @NonNull Set<CuboidRegion> getRegions() {
2364        if (!this.isMerged()) {
2365            Location pos1 = this.getBottomAbs().withY(getArea().getMinBuildHeight());
2366            Location pos2 = this.getTopAbs().withY(getArea().getMaxBuildHeight());
2367            CuboidRegion rg = new CuboidRegion(pos1.getBlockVector3(), pos2.getBlockVector3());
2368            return Collections.singleton(rg);
2369        }
2370        Set<Plot> plots = this.getConnectedPlots();
2371        Set<CuboidRegion> regions = new HashSet<>();
2372        Set<PlotId> visited = new HashSet<>();
2373        for (Plot current : plots) {
2374            if (visited.contains(current.getId())) {
2375                continue;
2376            }
2377            boolean merge = true;
2378            PlotId bot = current.getId();
2379            PlotId top = current.getId();
2380            while (merge) {
2381                merge = false;
2382                Iterable<PlotId> ids = PlotId.PlotRangeIterator.range(
2383                        PlotId.of(bot.getX(), bot.getY() - 1),
2384                        PlotId.of(top.getX(), bot.getY() - 1)
2385                );
2386                boolean tmp = true;
2387                for (PlotId id : ids) {
2388                    Plot plot = this.area.getPlotAbs(id);
2389                    if (plot == null || !plot.isMerged(Direction.SOUTH) || visited.contains(plot.getId())) {
2390                        tmp = false;
2391                    }
2392                }
2393                if (tmp) {
2394                    merge = true;
2395                    bot = PlotId.of(bot.getX(), bot.getY() - 1);
2396                }
2397                ids = PlotId.PlotRangeIterator.range(
2398                        PlotId.of(top.getX() + 1, bot.getY()),
2399                        PlotId.of(top.getX() + 1, top.getY())
2400                );
2401                tmp = true;
2402                for (PlotId id : ids) {
2403                    Plot plot = this.area.getPlotAbs(id);
2404                    if (plot == null || !plot.isMerged(Direction.WEST) || visited.contains(plot.getId())) {
2405                        tmp = false;
2406                    }
2407                }
2408                if (tmp) {
2409                    merge = true;
2410                    top = PlotId.of(top.getX() + 1, top.getY());
2411                }
2412                ids = PlotId.PlotRangeIterator.range(
2413                        PlotId.of(bot.getX(), top.getY() + 1),
2414                        PlotId.of(top.getX(), top.getY() + 1)
2415                );
2416                tmp = true;
2417                for (PlotId id : ids) {
2418                    Plot plot = this.area.getPlotAbs(id);
2419                    if (plot == null || !plot.isMerged(Direction.NORTH) || visited.contains(plot.getId())) {
2420                        tmp = false;
2421                    }
2422                }
2423                if (tmp) {
2424                    merge = true;
2425                    top = PlotId.of(top.getX(), top.getY() + 1);
2426                }
2427                ids = PlotId.PlotRangeIterator.range(
2428                        PlotId.of(bot.getX() - 1, bot.getY()),
2429                        PlotId.of(bot.getX() - 1, top.getY())
2430                );
2431                tmp = true;
2432                for (PlotId id : ids) {
2433                    Plot plot = this.area.getPlotAbs(id);
2434                    if (plot == null || !plot.isMerged(Direction.EAST) || visited.contains(plot.getId())) {
2435                        tmp = false;
2436                    }
2437                }
2438                if (tmp) {
2439                    merge = true;
2440                    bot = PlotId.of(bot.getX() - 1, bot.getY());
2441                }
2442            }
2443            int minHeight = getArea().getMinBuildHeight();
2444            int maxHeight = getArea().getMaxBuildHeight() - 1;
2445            Location gtopabs = this.area.getPlotAbs(top).getTopAbs();
2446            Location gbotabs = this.area.getPlotAbs(bot).getBottomAbs();
2447            visited.addAll(Lists.newArrayList((Iterable<? extends PlotId>) PlotId.PlotRangeIterator.range(bot, top)));
2448            for (int x = bot.getX(); x <= top.getX(); x++) {
2449                Plot plot = this.area.getPlotAbs(PlotId.of(x, top.getY()));
2450                if (plot.isMerged(Direction.SOUTH)) {
2451                    // south wedge
2452                    Location toploc = plot.getExtendedTopAbs();
2453                    Location botabs = plot.getBottomAbs();
2454                    Location topabs = plot.getTopAbs();
2455                    BlockVector3 pos1 = BlockVector3.at(botabs.getX(), minHeight, topabs.getZ() + 1);
2456                    BlockVector3 pos2 = BlockVector3.at(topabs.getX(), maxHeight, toploc.getZ());
2457                    regions.add(new CuboidRegion(pos1, pos2));
2458                    if (plot.isMerged(Direction.SOUTHEAST)) {
2459                        pos1 = BlockVector3.at(topabs.getX() + 1, minHeight, topabs.getZ() + 1);
2460                        pos2 = BlockVector3.at(toploc.getX(), maxHeight, toploc.getZ());
2461                        regions.add(new CuboidRegion(pos1, pos2));
2462                        // intersection
2463                    }
2464                }
2465            }
2466
2467            for (int y = bot.getY(); y <= top.getY(); y++) {
2468                Plot plot = this.area.getPlotAbs(PlotId.of(top.getX(), y));
2469                if (plot.isMerged(Direction.EAST)) {
2470                    // east wedge
2471                    Location toploc = plot.getExtendedTopAbs();
2472                    Location botabs = plot.getBottomAbs();
2473                    Location topabs = plot.getTopAbs();
2474                    BlockVector3 pos1 = BlockVector3.at(topabs.getX() + 1, minHeight, botabs.getZ());
2475                    BlockVector3 pos2 = BlockVector3.at(toploc.getX(), maxHeight, topabs.getZ());
2476                    regions.add(new CuboidRegion(pos1, pos2));
2477                    if (plot.isMerged(Direction.SOUTHEAST)) {
2478                        pos1 = BlockVector3.at(topabs.getX() + 1, minHeight, topabs.getZ() + 1);
2479                        pos2 = BlockVector3.at(toploc.getX(), maxHeight, toploc.getZ());
2480                        regions.add(new CuboidRegion(pos1, pos2));
2481                        // intersection
2482                    }
2483                }
2484            }
2485            BlockVector3 pos1 = BlockVector3.at(gbotabs.getX(), minHeight, gbotabs.getZ());
2486            BlockVector3 pos2 = BlockVector3.at(gtopabs.getX(), maxHeight, gtopabs.getZ());
2487            regions.add(new CuboidRegion(pos1, pos2));
2488        }
2489        return regions;
2490    }
2491
2492    /**
2493     * Attempt to find the largest rectangular region in a plot (as plots can form non rectangular shapes)
2494     *
2495     * @return the plot's largest CuboidRegion
2496     */
2497    public CuboidRegion getLargestRegion() {
2498        Set<CuboidRegion> regions = this.getRegions();
2499        CuboidRegion max = null;
2500        double area = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
2501        for (CuboidRegion region : regions) {
2502            double current = (region.getMaximumPoint().getX() - (double) region.getMinimumPoint().getX() + 1) * (
2503                    region.getMaximumPoint().getZ() - (double) region.getMinimumPoint().getZ() + 1);
2504            if (current > area) {
2505                max = region;
2506                area = current;
2507            }
2508        }
2509        return max;
2510    }

2512    /**
2513     * Do the plot entry tasks for each player in the plot<br>
2514     * - Usually called when the plot state changes (unclaimed/claimed/flag change etc)
2515     */
2516    public void reEnter() {
2517        TaskManager.runTaskLater(() -> {
2518            for (PlotPlayer<?> pp : Plot.this.getPlayersInPlot()) {
2519                this.plotListener.plotExit(pp, Plot.this);
2520                this.plotListener.plotEntry(pp, Plot.this);
2521            }
2522        }, TaskTime.ticks(1L));
2523    }
2524
2525    public void debug(final @NonNull String message) {
2526        try {
2527            final Collection<PlotPlayer<?>> players = PlotPlayer.getDebugModePlayersInPlot(this);
2528            if (players.isEmpty()) {
2529                return;
2530            }
2531            Caption caption = TranslatableCaption.of("debug.plot_debug");
2532            TagResolver resolver = TagResolver.builder()
2533                    .tag("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(toString())))
2534                    .tag("message", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message)))
2535                    .build();
2536            for (final PlotPlayer<?> player : players) {
2537                if (isOwner(player.getUUID()) || player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DEBUG_OTHER)) {
2538                    player.sendMessage(caption, resolver);
2539                }
2540            }
2541        } catch (final Exception ignored) {
2542        }
2543    }

2545    /**
2546     * Teleport a player to a plot and send them the teleport message.
2547     *
2548     * @param player the player
2549     * @param result Called with the result of the teleportation
2550     */
2551    public void teleportPlayer(final PlotPlayer<?> player, Consumer<Boolean> result) {
2552        teleportPlayer(player, TeleportCause.PLUGIN, result);
2553    }
2554
2555    /**
2556     * Teleport a player to a plot and send them the teleport message.
2557     *
2558     * @param player         the player
2559     * @param cause          the cause of the teleport
2560     * @param resultConsumer Called with the result of the teleportation
2561     */
2562    public void teleportPlayer(final PlotPlayer<?> player, TeleportCause cause, Consumer<Boolean> resultConsumer) {
2563        Plot plot = this.getBasePlot(false);
2564        if ((getArea() == null || !(getArea() instanceof SinglePlotArea)) && !WorldUtil.isValidLocation(plot.getBottomAbs())) {
2565            // prevent from teleporting into unsafe regions
2566            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
2567            resultConsumer.accept(false);
2568            return;
2569        }
2570
2571        PlayerTeleportToPlotEvent event = this.eventDispatcher.callTeleport(player, player.getLocation(), plot, cause);
2572        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
2573            player.sendMessage(
2574                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
2575                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Teleport")))
2576            );
2577            resultConsumer.accept(false);
2578            return;
2579        }
2580
2581        final Consumer<Location> locationConsumer = calculatedLocation -> {
2582            Location location = event.getLocationTransformer() == null ? calculatedLocation :
2583                    Objects.requireNonNullElse(event.getLocationTransformer().apply(calculatedLocation), calculatedLocation);
2584            if (Settings.Teleport.DELAY == 0 || player.hasPermission("plots.teleport.delay.bypass")) {
2585                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleported_to_plot"));
2586                player.teleport(location, cause);
2587                resultConsumer.accept(true);
2588                return;
2589            }
2590            player.sendMessage(
2591                    TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleport_in_seconds"),
2592                    TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(Settings.Teleport.DELAY)))
2593            );
2594            final String name = player.getName();
2595            TaskManager.addToTeleportQueue(name);
2596            TaskManager.runTaskLater(() -> {
2597                if (!TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(name)) {
2598                    return;
2599                }
2600                try {
2601                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleported_to_plot"));
2602                    player.teleport(location, cause);
2603                } catch (final Exception ignored) {
2604                }
2605            }, TaskTime.seconds(Settings.Teleport.DELAY));
2606            resultConsumer.accept(true);
2607        };
2608        if (this.area.isHomeAllowNonmember() || plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
2609            this.getHome(locationConsumer);
2610        } else {
2611            this.getDefaultHome(false, locationConsumer);
2612        }
2613    }
2614
2615    /**
2616     * Checks if the owner of this Plot is online.
2617     *
2618     * @return {@code true} if the owner of the Plot is online
2619     */
2620    public boolean isOnline() {
2621        if (!this.hasOwner()) {
2622            return false;
2623        }
2624        if (!isMerged()) {
2625            return PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(Objects.requireNonNull(this.getOwnerAbs())) != null;
2626        }
2627        for (final Plot current : getConnectedPlots()) {
2628            if (current.hasOwner()
2629                    && PlotSquared
2630                    .platform()
2631                    .playerManager()
2632                    .getPlayerIfExists(Objects.requireNonNull(current.getOwnerAbs())) != null) {
2633                return true;
2634            }
2635        }
2636        return false;
2637    }
2638
2639    /**
2640     * Get the maximum distance of the plot from x=0, z=0.
2641     *
2642     * @return max block distance from 0,0
2643     */
2644    public int getDistanceFromOrigin() {
2645        Location bot = getManager().getPlotBottomLocAbs(id);
2646        Location top = getManager().getPlotTopLocAbs(id);
2647        return Math.max(
2648                Math.max(Math.abs(bot.getX()), Math.abs(bot.getZ())),
2649                Math.max(Math.abs(top.getX()), Math.abs(top.getZ()))
2650        );
2651    }
2652
2653    /**
2654     * Expands the world border to include this plot if it is beyond the current border.
2655     */
2656    public void updateWorldBorder() {
2657        int border = this.area.getBorder(false);
2658        if (border == Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
2659            return;
2660        }
2661        int max = getDistanceFromOrigin();
2662        if (max > border) {
2663            this.area.setMeta("worldBorder", max);
2664        }
2665    }
2666
2667    /**
2668     * Merges two plots. <br>- Assumes plots are directly next to each other <br> - saves to DB
2669     *
2670     * @param lesserPlot  the plot to merge into this plot instance
2671     * @param removeRoads if roads should be removed during the merge
2672     * @param queue       Nullable {@link QueueCoordinator}. If null, creates own queue and enqueues,
2673     *                    otherwise writes to the queue but does not enqueue.
2674     */
2675    public void mergePlot(Plot lesserPlot, boolean removeRoads, @Nullable QueueCoordinator queue) {
2676        Plot greaterPlot = this;
2677        lesserPlot.getPlotModificationManager().removeSign();
2678        if (lesserPlot.getId().getX() == greaterPlot.getId().getX()) {
2679            if (lesserPlot.getId().getY() > greaterPlot.getId().getY()) {
2680                Plot tmp = lesserPlot;
2681                lesserPlot = greaterPlot;
2682                greaterPlot = tmp;
2683            }
2684            if (!lesserPlot.isMerged(Direction.SOUTH)) {
2685                lesserPlot.clearRatings();
2686                greaterPlot.clearRatings();
2687                lesserPlot.setMerged(Direction.SOUTH, true);
2688                greaterPlot.setMerged(Direction.NORTH, true);
2689                lesserPlot.mergeData(greaterPlot);
2690                if (removeRoads) {
2691                    //lesserPlot.removeSign();
2692                    lesserPlot.getPlotModificationManager().removeRoadSouth(queue);
2693                    Plot diagonal = greaterPlot.getRelative(Direction.EAST);
2694                    if (diagonal.isMerged(Direction.NORTHWEST)) {
2695                        lesserPlot.plotModificationManager.removeRoadSouthEast(queue);
2696                    }
2697                    Plot below = greaterPlot.getRelative(Direction.WEST);
2698                    if (below.isMerged(Direction.NORTHEAST)) {
2699                        below.getRelative(Direction.NORTH).plotModificationManager.removeRoadSouthEast(queue);
2700                    }
2701                }
2702            }
2703        } else {
2704            if (lesserPlot.getId().getX() > greaterPlot.getId().getX()) {
2705                Plot tmp = lesserPlot;
2706                lesserPlot = greaterPlot;
2707                greaterPlot = tmp;
2708            }
2709            if (!lesserPlot.isMerged(Direction.EAST)) {
2710                lesserPlot.clearRatings();
2711                greaterPlot.clearRatings();
2712                lesserPlot.setMerged(Direction.EAST, true);
2713                greaterPlot.setMerged(Direction.WEST, true);
2714                lesserPlot.mergeData(greaterPlot);
2715                if (removeRoads) {
2716                    //lesserPlot.removeSign();
2717                    Plot diagonal = greaterPlot.getRelative(Direction.SOUTH);
2718                    if (diagonal.isMerged(Direction.NORTHWEST)) {
2719                        lesserPlot.plotModificationManager.removeRoadSouthEast(queue);
2720                    }
2721                    lesserPlot.plotModificationManager.removeRoadEast(queue);
2722                }
2723                Plot below = greaterPlot.getRelative(Direction.NORTH);
2724                if (below.isMerged(Direction.SOUTHWEST)) {
2725                    below.getRelative(Direction.WEST).getPlotModificationManager().removeRoadSouthEast(queue);
2726                }
2727            }
2728        }
2729    }
2730
2731    /**
2732     * Check if the plot is merged in a given direction
2733     *
2734     * @param direction Direction
2735     * @return {@code true} if the plot is merged in the given direction
2736     */
2737    public boolean isMerged(final @NonNull Direction direction) {
2738        return isMerged(direction.getIndex());
2739    }

2741    /**
2742     * Get the value associated with the specified flag. This will first look at plot
2743     * specific flag values, then at the containing plot area and its default values
2744     * and at last, it will look at the default values stored in {@link GlobalFlagContainer}.
2745     *
2746     * @param flagClass The flag type (Class)
2747     * @param <T>       the flag value type
2748     * @return The flag value
2749     */
2750    public @NonNull <T> T getFlag(final @NonNull Class<? extends PlotFlag<T, ?>> flagClass) {
2751        return this.flagContainer.getFlag(flagClass).getValue();
2752    }
2753
2754    /**
2755     * Get the value associated with the specified flag. This will first look at plot
2756     * specific flag values, then at the containing plot area and its default values
2757     * and at last, it will look at the default values stored in {@link GlobalFlagContainer}.
2758     *
2759     * @param flag The flag type (Any instance of the flag)
2760     * @param <V>  the flag type (Any instance of the flag)
2761     * @param <T>  the flag's value type
2762     * @return The flag value
2763     */
2764    public @NonNull <T, V extends PlotFlag<T, ?>> T getFlag(final @NonNull V flag) {
2765        final Class<?> flagClass = flag.getClass();
2766        final PlotFlag<?, ?> flagInstance = this.flagContainer.getFlagErased(flagClass);
2767        return FlagContainer.<T, V>castUnsafe(flagInstance).getValue();
2768    }
2769
2770    public CompletableFuture<Caption> format(final Caption iInfo, PlotPlayer<?> player, final boolean full) {
2771        final CompletableFuture<Caption> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
2772        int num = this.getConnectedPlots().size();
2773        ComponentLike alias = !this.getAlias().isEmpty() ?
2774                Component.text(this.getAlias()) :
2775                TranslatableCaption.of("info.none").toComponent(player);
2776        Location bot = this.getCorners()[0];
2777        PlotSquared.platform().worldUtil().getBiome(
2778                Objects.requireNonNull(this.getWorldName()),
2779                bot.getX(),
2780                bot.getZ(),
2781                biome -> {
2782                    ComponentLike trusted = PlayerManager.getPlayerList(this.getTrusted(), player);
2783                    ComponentLike members = PlayerManager.getPlayerList(this.getMembers(), player);
2784                    ComponentLike denied = PlayerManager.getPlayerList(this.getDenied(), player);
2785                    ComponentLike seen;
2786                    ExpireManager expireManager = PlotSquared.platform().expireManager();
2787                    if (Settings.Enabled_Components.PLOT_EXPIRY && expireManager != null) {
2788                        if (this.isOnline()) {
2789                            seen = TranslatableCaption.of("info.now").toComponent(player);
2790                        } else {
2791                            int time = (int) (PlotSquared.platform().expireManager().getAge(this, false) / 1000);
2792                            if (time != 0) {
2793                                seen = Component.text(TimeUtil.secToTime(time));
2794                            } else {
2795                                seen = TranslatableCaption.of("info.unknown").toComponent(player);
2796                            }
2797                        }
2798                    } else {
2799                        seen = TranslatableCaption.of("info.never").toComponent(player);
2800                    }
2801
2802                    ComponentLike description = TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_no_description").toComponent(player);
2803                    String descriptionValue = this.getFlag(DescriptionFlag.class);
2804                    if (!descriptionValue.isEmpty()) {
2805                        description = Component.text(descriptionValue);
2806                    }
2807
2808                    ComponentLike flags;
2809                    Collection<PlotFlag<?, ?>> flagCollection = this.getApplicableFlags(true);
2810                    if (flagCollection.isEmpty()) {
2811                        flags = TranslatableCaption.of("info.none").toComponent(player);
2812                    } else {
2813                        TextComponent.Builder flagBuilder = Component.text();
2814                        String prefix = "";
2815                        for (final PlotFlag<?, ?> flag : flagCollection) {
2816                            Object value;
2817                            if (flag instanceof DoubleFlag && !Settings.General.SCIENTIFIC) {
2818                                value = FLAG_DECIMAL_FORMAT.format(flag.getValue());
2819                            } else {
2820                                value = flag.toString();
2821                            }
2822                            Component snip = MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(
2823                                    prefix + CaptionUtility.format(
2824                                            player,
2825                                            TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_flag_list").getComponent(player)
2826                                    ),
2827                                    TagResolver.builder()
2828                                            .tag("flag", Tag.inserting(Component.text(flag.getName())))
2829                                            .tag("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(CaptionUtility.formatRaw(
2830                                                    player,
2831                                                    value.toString()
2832                                            ))))
2833                                            .build()
2834                            );
2835                            flagBuilder.append(snip);
2836                            prefix = ", ";
2837                        }
2838                        flags = flagBuilder.build();
2839                    }
2840                    boolean build = this.isAdded(player.getUUID());
2841                    Component owner;
2842                    if (this.getOwner() == null) {
2843                        owner = Component.text("unowned");
2844                    } else if (this.getOwner().equals(DBFunc.SERVER)) {
2845                        owner = Component.text(MINI_MESSAGE.stripTags(TranslatableCaption
2846                                .of("info.server")
2847                                .getComponent(player)));
2848                    } else {
2849                        owner = PlayerManager.getPlayerList(this.getOwners(), player);
2850                    }
2851                    TagResolver.Builder tagBuilder = TagResolver.builder();
2852                    tagBuilder.tag("header", Tag.inserting(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_info_header").toComponent(player)));
2853                    tagBuilder.tag("footer", Tag.inserting(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_info_footer").toComponent(player)));
2854                    TextComponent.Builder areaComponent = Component.text();
2855                    if (this.getArea() != null) {
2856                        areaComponent.append(Component.text(getArea().getWorldName()));
2857                        if (getArea().getId() != null) {
2858                            areaComponent.append(Component.text("("))
2859                                    .append(Component.text(getArea().getId()))
2860                                    .append(Component.text(")"));
2861                        }
2862                    } else {
2863                        areaComponent.append(TranslatableCaption.of("info.none").toComponent(player));
2864                    }
2865                    tagBuilder.tag("area", Tag.inserting(areaComponent));
2866                    long creationDate = Long.parseLong(String.valueOf(timestamp));
2867                    SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat(Settings.Timeformat.DATE_FORMAT);
2868                    sdf.setTimeZone(TimeZone.getTimeZone(Settings.Timeformat.TIME_ZONE));
2869                    String newDate = sdf.format(creationDate);
2870
2871                    tagBuilder.tag("id", Tag.inserting(Component.text(getId().toString())));
2872                    tagBuilder.tag("alias", Tag.inserting(alias));
2873                    tagBuilder.tag("num", Tag.inserting(Component.text(num)));
2874                    tagBuilder.tag("desc", Tag.inserting(description));
2875                    tagBuilder.tag("biome", Tag.inserting(Component.text(biome.toString().toLowerCase())));
2876                    tagBuilder.tag("owner", Tag.inserting(owner));
2877                    tagBuilder.tag("members", Tag.inserting(members));
2878                    tagBuilder.tag("player", Tag.inserting(Component.text(player.getName())));
2879                    tagBuilder.tag("trusted", Tag.inserting(trusted));
2880                    tagBuilder.tag("denied", Tag.inserting(denied));
2881                    tagBuilder.tag("seen", Tag.inserting(seen));
2882                    tagBuilder.tag("flags", Tag.inserting(flags));
2883                    tagBuilder.tag("creationdate", Tag.inserting(Component.text(newDate)));
2884                    tagBuilder.tag("build", Tag.inserting(Component.text(build)));
2885                    tagBuilder.tag("size", Tag.inserting(Component.text(getConnectedPlots().size())));
2886                    String component = iInfo.getComponent(player);
2887                    if (component.contains("<rating>") || component.contains("<likes>")) {
2888                        TaskManager.runTaskAsync(() -> {
2889                            if (Settings.Ratings.USE_LIKES) {
2890                                tagBuilder.tag("rating", Tag.inserting(Component.text(
2891                                        String.format("%.0f%%", Like.getLikesPercentage(this) * 100D)
2892                                )));
2893                                tagBuilder.tag("likes", Tag.inserting(Component.text(
2894                                        String.format("%.0f%%", Like.getLikesPercentage(this) * 100D)
2895                                )));
2896                            } else {
2897                                int max = 10;
2898                                if (Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES != null && !Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES.isEmpty()) {
2899                                    max = 8;
2900                                }
2901                                if (full && Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES != null && Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES.size() > 1) {
2902                                    double[] ratings = this.getAverageRatings();
2903                                    StringBuilder rating = new StringBuilder();
2904                                    String prefix = "";
2905                                    for (int i = 0; i < ratings.length; i++) {
2906                                        rating.append(prefix).append(Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES.get(i)).append('=')
2907                                                .append(String.format("%.1f", ratings[i]));
2908                                        prefix = ",";
2909                                    }
2910                                    tagBuilder.tag("rating", Tag.inserting(Component.text(rating.toString())));
2911                                } else {
2912                                    double rating = this.getAverageRating();
2913                                    if (Double.isFinite(rating)) {
2914                                        tagBuilder.tag(
2915                                                "rating",
2916                                                Tag.inserting(Component.text(String.format("%.1f", rating) + '/' + max))
2917                                        );
2918                                    } else {
2919                                        tagBuilder.tag(
2920                                                "rating", Tag.inserting(TranslatableCaption.of("info.none").toComponent(player))
2921                                        );
2922                                    }
2923                                }
2924                                tagBuilder.tag("likes", Tag.inserting(Component.text("N/A")));
2925                            }
2926                            future.complete(StaticCaption.of(MINI_MESSAGE.serialize(MINI_MESSAGE
2927                                    .deserialize(
2928                                            iInfo.getComponent(player),
2929                                            tagBuilder.build()
2930                                    ))));
2931                        });
2932                        return;
2933                    }
2934                    future.complete(StaticCaption.of(MINI_MESSAGE.serialize(MINI_MESSAGE
2935                            .deserialize(
2936                                    iInfo.getComponent(player),
2937                                    tagBuilder.build()
2938                            ))));
2939                }
2940        );
2941        return future;
2942    }
2943
2944    /**
2945     * If rating categories are enabled, get the average rating by category.<br>
2946     * - The index corresponds to the index of the category in the config
2947     *
2948     * <p>
2949     * See {@link Settings.Ratings#CATEGORIES} for rating categories
2950     * </p>
2951     *
2952     * @return Average ratings in each category
2953     */
2954    public @NonNull double[] getAverageRatings() {
2955        Map<UUID, Integer> rating;
2956        if (this.getSettings().getRatings() != null) {
2957            rating = this.getSettings().getRatings();
2958        } else if (Settings.Enabled_Components.RATING_CACHE) {
2959            rating = new HashMap<>();
2960        } else {
2961            rating = DBFunc.getRatings(this);
2962        }
2963        int size = 1;
2964        if (!Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES.isEmpty()) {
2965            size = Math.max(1, Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES.size());
2966        }
2967        double[] ratings = new double[size];
2968        if (rating == null || rating.isEmpty()) {
2969            return ratings;
2970        }
2971        for (Entry<UUID, Integer> entry : rating.entrySet()) {
2972            int current = entry.getValue();
2973            if (Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES.isEmpty()) {
2974                ratings[0] += current;
2975            } else {
2976                for (int i = 0; i < Settings.Ratings.CATEGORIES.size(); i++) {
2977                    ratings[i] += current % 10 - 1;
2978                    current /= 10;
2979                }
2980            }
2981        }
2982        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
2983            ratings[i] /= rating.size();
2984        }
2985        return ratings;
2986    }
